com.googlecode.cqengine.engine

Interface QueryEngine<O>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexedCollection<O>, QueryEngineInternal<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollectionQueryEngine, ConcurrentIndexedCollection, ObjectLockingIndexedCollection, TransactionalIndexedCollection

    public interface QueryEngine<O>
    The main component of CQEngine - maintains a set of indexes on a collection and accepts queries which it performs and optimizes for those indexes.
    Author:
    Niall Gallagher

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addIndex(Index<O> index)
      Adds the given index to the collection.
      void addIndex(Index<O> index, QueryOptions queryOptions)
      Adds the given index to the collection.
      Iterable<Index<O>> getIndexes()
      Returns the set of which were previously added to the collection via the addIndex(com.googlecode.cqengine.index.Index) method.
      ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query)
      Retrieves a ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query.
      ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query, QueryOptions queryOptions)
      Retrieves a ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query, additionally accepting QueryOptions which can specify ordering of results, deduplication strategy etc.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieve

        ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query)
        Retrieves a ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query.
        Parameters:
        query - A query representing some assertions which sought objects must match
        Returns:
        A ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query

      • retrieve

        ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query,
                    QueryOptions queryOptions)
        Retrieves a ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query, additionally accepting QueryOptions which can specify ordering of results, deduplication strategy etc.
        Parameters:
        query - A query representing some assertions which sought objects must match
        queryOptions - Optional parameters for the query
        Returns:
        A ResultSet which provides objects matching the given query

      • addIndex

        void addIndex(Index<O> index)
        Adds the given index to the collection.

        Subsequently queries passed to the retrieve(com.googlecode.cqengine.query.Query) methods will use these indexes if suitable for the particular queries, to speed up retrievals.

        Parameters:
        index - The index to add

      • addIndex

        void addIndex(Index<O> index,
            QueryOptions queryOptions)
        Adds the given index to the collection.

        Subsequently queries passed to the retrieve(com.googlecode.cqengine.query.Query) methods will use these indexes if suitable for the particular queries, to speed up retrievals.

        Parameters:
        index - The index to add
        queryOptions - Optional parameters for the index

      • getIndexes

        Iterable<Index<O>> getIndexes()
        Returns the set of which were previously added to the collection via the addIndex(com.googlecode.cqengine.index.Index) method.
        Returns:
        The set of which were previously added to the collection via the addIndex(com.googlecode.cqengine.index.Index) method
